entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023
